text: Today we will explore how Electromyography (EMG) signals can be used to control a robotic gripper.
By the end of this activity, you will be able to model the performance of a bionic arm.

tiles.title: Sketch of muscle control of a robot gripper

text: Think about the muscle EMG signals that we measured in the previous lesson. How would you use these signals to make a robotic gripper open or close?
